mapper.update:
UPDATE sell_platform_standard_unit
sell_platform_id = #{sellPlatformId},
standard_unit_id = #{standardUnitId},
sale_price = #{salePrice},
path = #{path},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE sell_platform_standard_unit
sale_price = #{salePrice},
path = #{path},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
platform_id = #{platformId},
WHERE standard_unit_id = #{standardUnitId} and sell_platform_id = #{sellPlatformId}
